snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 32 points to help the Boston Celtics fend off the short-handed New Orleans Pelicans 104-97 on Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 32 points to help the Boston Celtics fend off the short-handed New Orleans Pelicans 104-97 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Celtics Fight Off Short-Handed Pelicans Late in 104-97 Win
headline.print_headline: Celtics Fight Off Short-Handed Pelicans Late in 104-97 Win
